verses.verse: Moses <WH4872> went up <WH5927> from the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> to Mount <WH2022> Nebo, <WH5015> to the top <WH7218> of Pisgah, <WH6449> that is over against <WH6440> Jericho. <WH3405> Yahweh <WH3068> showed <WH7200> him all the land <WH776> of Gilead, <WH1568> to Dan, <WH1835>
and all Naphtali, <WH5321> and the land <WH776> of Ephraim <WH669> and Manasseh, <WH4519> and all the land <WH776> of Judah, <WH3063> to the hinder <WH314> sea, <WH3220>
and the South, <WH5045> and the Plain <WH3603> of the valley <WH1237> of Jericho <WH3405> the city <WH5892> of palm trees, <WH8558> to Zoar. <WH6820>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, <WH776> "This is the land which I swore <WH7650> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob, <WH3290> saying, <WH559> <WH5414> 'I will give it to your seed. <WH2233>' I have caused you to see <WH7200> it with your eyes, <WH5869> but you shall not go over there. <WH5674>"
So Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of Yahweh <WH3068> died <WH4191> there in the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> according to the word <WH6310> of Yahweh. <WH3068>

He buried <WH6912> him in the valley <WH1516> in the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124> over against <WH4136> Beth Peor: <WH1047> but no man <WH376> knows <WH3045> of his tomb <WH6900> to this day. <WH3117>
Moses <WH4872> was one hundred <WH3967> twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he died: <WH4194> his eye <WH5869> was not dim, <WH3543> nor his natural force <WH3893> abated. <WH5127>

The children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> wept <WH1058> for Moses <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> thirty <WH7970> days: <WH3117> so the days <WH3117> of weeping <WH1065> in the mourning <WH60> for Moses <WH4872> were ended. <WH8552>

Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> was full <WH4392> of the spirit <WH7307> of wisdom; <WH2451> for Moses <WH4872> had laid <WH5564> his hands <WH3027> on him: <WH1121> and the children of Israel <WH3478> listened <WH8085> to him, <WH6213> and did as Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>
There has not arisen <WH6965> a prophet <WH5030> since <WH5750> in Israel <WH3478> like Moses, <WH4872> whom Yahweh <WH3068> knew <WH3045> face <WH6440> to face, <WH6440>

in all the signs <WH226> and the wonders, <WH4159> which Yahweh <WH3068> sent <WH7971> him to do <WH6213> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and to all his servants, <WH5650> and to all his land, <WH776>
and in all the mighty <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and in all the great <WH1419> terror, <WH4172> which Moses <WH4872> worked <WH6213> in the sight <WH5869> of all Israel. <WH3478>
